reporter_caption.center: TRAMMELL v. DIVISION OF CHILD SUPPORT ENFORCEMENT, 850 A.2d 303 (Del. 2004)

caption.center: GEORGE K. TRAMMELL, III, Petitioner Below, Appellant, v. DIVISION OF CHILD
SUPPORT ENFORCEMENT/SONYA THOMAS, Respondent Below, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Family Court of the State of Delaware, in and Sussex County in File No. CS91-3977; Pet. No. 01-33757.
opinion.panel: Before BERGER, STEELE and JACOBS, Justices.
opinion.opinion_text:
This 13th day of May 2004, the Court has considered this matter on the briefs of the parties, and has concluded that the matter should be affirmed on the basis of, and for the reasons assigned by, the Family Court in its order dated May 6, 2003.
NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the judgment of the Family Court is AFFIRMED.
